description.value:
Nomadic heritage characters hail from a tight-knit community that regularly moves to and from different areas. Your people might flow with seasonally available plants and game, follow established trade routes, or roam for a more unique reason. People of nomadic heritage are suited to the rigors of travel and often understand environmental cycles and the hazards or benefits that come with them.
